cosmos.question: I'm a bright star that shines in the day, but you can't see me at night, what am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give you light and warmth.
☀️ Planets orbit around me.
😎 I am very, very hot.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's companion, I light up the night, and I seem to change shape every night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I have phases like crescent and full.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.
🌎 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a recognizable pattern in the sky, sometimes representing animals or mythological figures. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ People used me to navigate a long time ago.
ursa You might know the Big Dipper.
🔗 Stars form a pattern.

cosmos.question: I am a giant, luminous ball of plasma held together by my own gravity. I twinkle when you see me from Earth at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am much bigger than Earth
🌟 The Sun is a very important one of me
💡 I shine because of nuclear reactions.

cosmos.question: I am a very large collection of stars, gas, dust, and dark matter, all held together by gravity. Our solar system lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral or elliptical in shape.
🌌 We live in the Milky Way.
✨ There are billions of stars within me.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I am too small to be considered a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be found in the asteroid belt.
🪐 I am smaller than a planet.
🌑 I am mostly made of rock and metal.

cosmos.question: I am a small piece of rock or metal that burns up as it passes through Earth's atmosphere, creating a bright streak of light in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 Sometimes called a falling star.
🔥 I create a shooting star.
☄️ I am smaller than an asteroid.

cosmos.question: I am a large cloud of gas and dust in space. Stars are born within me, and some are formed from the remnants of dying stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colourful.
💨 Stars are made of me.
✨ The Pillars of Creation are a famous example.

cosmos.question: I am a celestial body composed mostly of ice, dust, and rock. When I get closer to the Sun, I develop a visible tail. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am sometimes called a dirty snowball.
💫 I have a tail that points away from the Sun.
✨ Halley's is one example.

cosmos.question: I am a region of spacetime with such strong gravity that nothing, not even light, can escape my pull. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I have an event horizon.
🌌 I can warp spacetime.
⚫ Some are supermassive and at the center of galaxies.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I meow and purr, and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I am a common pet.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail, and love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I am known as man's best friend.
🎾 I love to chase after balls.

animal.question: I quack and swim in ponds and lakes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I like to eat bread.
🐣 Baby ducks are called ducklings.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.
🌱 I eat mostly leaves.

animal.question: I roar and live in the jungle, and I'm known as the king. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
👑 I am a symbol of strength.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
🌱 I eat plants and grass.
💪 I have strong legs for jumping.

animal.question: I slither and hiss, and some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
👅 I flick my tongue to smell.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I build dams and have large front teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am a rodent.
🇨🇦 I am the national animal of Canada.
🏠 I live in lodges.

animal.question: I am a big fish that jumps high out of the water, travelling upstream to lay eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am born in freshwater.
🐻 Bears love to eat me.
💪 I am known for my endurance.
